extendedInfo.description: âââââ A must have app if you're a Hottest (2PM Fan)âââââ So convenient, easy to use, and great ui. It sums up a lot of the information you would spend hours on the net looking for. If your a 2PM fan, a definite must have.Brighten up your day with 2PM Stage. We love Nickhun, Junsu, Taecyeon, WooYoung, Junho and Chansung so much that we decided to build this app.Be closer to your favorite 2PM boys Nickhun, Junsu, Taecyeon, WooYoung, Junho and Chansung as you can now get all 2PM videos, photos and news across various sites like AllKpop, Youtube, and Tumblr all put together in one beautiful interface. It definitely makes us happy.Now, also be able to access your 2PM Music Videos, while you have that precious few minutes to spend with the boys.Also, stay updated on all 2PM concerts and Updates on Twitter, all in one swipe on this beautifully designed app, created by Hottests, for Hottests.Also, save your favorite content for easy viewing later.Contact us at:@eumakh on Twitter or onwww.facebook.com/kpopmusiclove
